Module javaNeuralNetwork.main
Package neural_network.util

Class WeightedPartitioner

java.lang.Object
neural_network.util.Partitioner
neural_network.util.WeightedPartitioner
public class WeightedPartitioner extends Partitioner
Class to create a number of sets of size setSize from a list of numInts integers weighted by which ground truth class each integer lies in.

  • Constructor Details

    • WeightedPartitioner

      public WeightedPartitioner(int numInts, int setSize, List<Double> yVals, boolean doRegression, int numBins)
      Constructor method.
      Parameters:
      numInts - Number of integers.
      setSize - Size of each set.
      yVals - The classes/values for each datapoint.
      doRegression - Whether we have a regression or classification problem.
      numBins - If doRegression is true, this represents the number of bins to split the data into. Otherwise, this parameter is ignored.

    • WeightedPartitioner

      public WeightedPartitioner(int numInts, int setSize, List<Double> yVals)
      Constructor for classification. Note that numBins will not be used in a classification problem.
      Parameters:
      numInts - Number of integers.
      setSize - Size of each set.
      yVals - The classes/values for each datapoint.

  • Method Details

    • call

      public List<List<Integer>> call()
      Uses weights for each class to create sets of size setSize containing integers (sampled with replacement).
      Overrides:
      call in class Partitioner
      Returns:
      The list of lists of datapoint indices.
